titleInfo.title: The Account of the Death of Estifanos On the front parchment cover: Zena motu lä- Ǝsṭifanos; (ዜና ሞቱ ስአስጢሩናስ)

name.namePart: Unknown monk of the Gunda Gunde Monastery
